# Hey, I'm Dan! I'm a developer and writer!

## About Me
I'm 16, and I started messing around with HTML when I was about 12. At 13, after struggling with Ruby, my good friend, [@Timanttikuutio](https://github.com/timanttikuutio), convinced me to learn Python. I took a 2 hour course on the basics of Python, and the rest is history!

## Current Projects
None
